content.description: Less than 100m to the climbers left of the Canyon Overlook area, Evart's Wall is home to several 50ft tall routes on sandstone. Topropes are primarily set off of bolt anchors. Developers have placed the bolts so you only need two 120cm slings or two quickdraws to rig them. There are one or two routes that are easily rigged off of large trees at the cliff edge.
